Package org.garret.perst.fulltext

Class FullTextSearchHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.garret.perst.PinnedPersistent
      • org.garret.perst.Persistent
        • org.garret.perst.fulltext.FullTextSearchHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, ICloneable, ILoadable, IPersistent, IStoreable

    public class FullTextSearchHelper
extends Persistent
    Helper class for full text search. This class provides functionality for parsing and stemming query and tuning document rank calculation
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getNearnessWeight

        public float getNearnessWeight()
        Get weight of nearness criteria in document rank. Document rank is calculated as (keywordRank*(1 + nearness*nearnessWeight))
        Returns:
        weight of nearness criteria

      • getNormalForms

        public java.lang.String[] getNormalForms(java.lang.String word,
                                         java.lang.String language)
        Perform stemming of the word
        Parameters:
        word - word to be stemmed
        language - language of the word (null if unknown)
        Returns:
        normal forms of the word (some words belongs to more than one part of the speech, so there are can be more than one normal form)

      • getOccurrenceKindWeights

        public float[] getOccurrenceKindWeights()
        Get occurrence kind weight. Occurrence kinds can be: in-title, in-header, emphased,... It is up to the document scanner implementation how to enumerate occurence kinds. These is only one limitation - number of difference kinds should not exceed 8.
        Returns:
        array with weights of each occurrence kind

      • getWordSwapPenalty

        public int getWordSwapPenalty()
        Get penalty of inverse word order in the text. Assume that document text contains phrase "ah oh ugh". And query "ugh ah" is executed. The distance between "ugh" and "ah" in the document text is 6. But as far as them are in difference order than in query, this distance will be multiplied on "swap penalty", so if swap penalty is 10, then distance between these two word is considered to be 60.
        Returns:
        swap penalty

      • isStopWord

        public boolean isStopWord(java.lang.String word)
        Check if word is stop word and should bw not included in index
        Parameters:
        word - lowercased word
        Returns:
        true if word is in stop list, false otherwize

      • isWordChar

        public boolean isWordChar(char ch)
        Check of character is part of the word

        Description copied from interface: ILoadable
        Method called by the database after loading of the object. It can be used to initialize transient fields of the object. Default implementation of this method do nothing
        Specified by:

      • parseText

        public Occurrence[] parseText(java.io.Reader reader)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Split text of the documents into tokens
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        array of occurrences of words in thedocument
        Throws:
